resources.string: ADDA Anti-Distracted Driving App: Drive safe mode is ON. Muted ringer. Blocking incoming calls
Please allow ADDA "Do Not Disturb Access"
Even using your phone while waiting at a traffic light is already a violation of RA 10913(Anti-Distracted Driving Act) and is punishable with up to 30,000 pesos in fines.
Press to turn ON safe driving mode
Auto SMS reply to incoming calls
Sorry. I can\'t answer right now. I\'m driving and complying with RA 10913(Anti-Distracted Driving Act). Sent using ADDA Android App https://goo.gl/3kiVD2
Press to turn OFF safe driving mode
